Creating a Post

February 4, 2017

To make your first blog post, just create a new markdown file in the _posts directory with the title format YYYY-MM-DD-title.md. Posts follow the simple markdown syntax and can include a wide array of multimedia formats.

This is a header

And this is a simple paragraph.

Smaller header

This is how you bold & italicize text.

Here is some inline code.

blockCode() {
	return true;
}
